attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the Decision to Bomb Syria
attributes.additional_details: Jesus said "Blessed are the Peace Makers" and we also read in 1 Peter 3:11 "They must turn from evil and do good; they must seek peace and pursue it."
attributes.background: As Christmas approaches, the Season of Peace and Goodwill to All People Everywhere, we the undersigned petition the Government to initiate a referendum of the British People to reject the Decision of 2 December 2015 to Bomb Syria and instead to pursue meaningful policies to encourage peace.
